attributes.action: Make Parental Alienation a conviction crime.
attributes.additional_details: The Case Of John William Greer Vs Pauline Hutchinson and Larne First Serve Community Social Services (1997) - Father when to court to gain custody after being denied access to his son.
attributes.background: If a parent, Grandparent or other relative or guardian of a child under the are of 18 is denying access to a parent then this should be a conviction offence.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by "a conviction crime".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
